name: Alexander Sterling
about: C++ | Rust System and Database Programmer. Passionate about high-performance computing and low-level systems design.
summary: Experienced system programmer with 10+ years of expertise in C++ and Rust, specializing in database engines, distributed systems, and performance-critical applications.

1.title: Optimizing Database Engines for High-Performance Query Execution

description.1: Designed and implemented a high-performance query execution engine in C++, reducing query latency by 40%.
description.2: Optimized database indexing algorithms, improving storage efficiency and retrieval speeds for large-scale datasets.
description.3: Developed a custom memory allocator in Rust for database workloads, reducing memory fragmentation and improving throughput.

description.1: Contributed to the development of a distributed file system in Rust, improving fault tolerance and scalability.
description.2: Enhanced kernel-level I/O operations for enterprise storage systems, achieving a 25% increase in read/write performance.
description.3: Implemented a Rust-based toolchain for debugging and profiling low-level system processes, streamlining developer workflows.

description.1: Refactored the storage engine in C++ to support multi-threaded operations, increasing transaction throughput by 30%.
description.2: Developed a Rust-based query optimizer, reducing query planning time and improving execution efficiency.
description.3: Integrated advanced caching mechanisms into the database engine, reducing disk I/O and improving response times.

description.1: Developed low-level C++ libraries for hardware-accelerated encryption, improving data security and performance.
description.2: Optimized multi-threaded algorithms for CPU-bound workloads, achieving a 20% performance boost in critical applications.
description.3: Collaborated on the design of a Rust-based framework for real-time data processing, enabling high-throughput analytics.

database.title: RustDB
database.description: A lightweight, high-performance database engine written in Rust, designed for embedded systems.

compiler.title: C++ Static Analyzer
compiler.description: A static analysis tool for C++ codebases, focusing on memory safety and performance optimizations.

os.title: Microkernel OS
os.description: A minimalistic microkernel operating system written in Rust, designed for educational purposes.
